title: which 6300 champion shjould i buy
body:
Azir, Barum, Rek'sai,  Kalista , Vel'koz and Gnar. I play all roles. 
I own the rest of the champions. 
Thank you.

replies.body: Definately Rek'sai, she's got great mobility and massive out dueling potential.
Haha i know she's good, perhaps a bit too good. I think we might see nerfs soon.
she got nerfed pretty hard already. She isn't as OP anymore, still a top pick.

Bumping for more votes, keep it up. You guys are amazing. 
Azir and Braum is out of the list now due to no votes
I also voted for Rek'sai. Her tunneling makes her one of the more unique champions on your list, and doesn't have a -7% win differential like certain Azirs I could mention.
Azir got hit hard with the nerf haha.
I voted Vel'Koz, because he deserves more play and is a very strong pick with his inbuilt true damage.
I reckon Vel'Koz. His and Karthus's ults are the most satisfying things to use in the game imo.

I'd hold off on Kalista honestly. She's gonna be hit with the nerf hammer soon.

Vel'koz is probably the most fun on that list but i'd buy Rek'sai.
